alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 8:08PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington County through 900 PM CST... At 808 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Lincoln, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Goshen... Walnut Grove... Woolsey... Rhea... Canehill... Morrow... Wheeler... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Sulphur City... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 48 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northwestern Arkansas.
